title: Bug splat in every 3 or so games
body:
Every few games my account will bugsplat to desktop, then my computer will beep like it's overheating, and then it will shut down.

It is absolutely not overheating, my video cards are up to date.

Geforce GTX 670M
Win 10

I get a warning message about half the time while my computer is beeping at me, saying it is a directX issue with LoL.  Standard fixes that are found online like deleting the RAD files have no effect.

Second post, I anticipate no response.  

Please let me know what other information you need.

replies.body: With your pc beeping and shutting down right after, I'd be a little worried that something is either overheating or crashing within your OS. I want you to reach out to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with some of your game logs. They'll be able to look through those to see what might be going on.
